segments.text: Excuse me . Do you know where I can find the nearest ICCC ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but it's quite a ways .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I need to take a bus ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This bus doesn't take you directly there . You'd have to change buses twice . I suggest you walk . It'll take you less than 20 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do I get there on foot ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Go straight ahead through the intersection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait , let me write this down ... Alright , I'm ready .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Keep walking till you pass the square , then turn right . Walk past two lights and turn left at the third .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Square ... turn right ... traffic lights ... And then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Keep walking and look for a tall building .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tall building ... Which side is the building on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The right side . ICCC should be on the first floor .
segments.speaker: S2
